dublin_core.dcvalue: mHBB uses mobile phones to support Helping Babies Breathe implementation in Kenya and is building a feasible, affordable, and efficient data collection system to support neonatal resuscitation scale-up.
Facility-based provider, Facility, CHW, Community member

Sherri Bucher, Principal Investigator, Indiana University School of Medicine, Email: shbucher@iu.edu; Professor Fabian Esamai, Senior Foreign Investigator, Moi University School of Medicine, Email: fesamai2007@gmail.com
Western Kenya, 23 health facilities in Bungoma, Busia, and Kakamega counties; Moi Teaching and Referral Hospital in Eldoret, Kenya
Data collection and reporting, Provider training and education, Newborn health
